metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3858 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 when aspecially crafted SFTP packet is received from the server. A remoteattacker who compromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial ofService or read data in the client memory.

criterions.comment: libssh2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
